GameConditionDef.label: colossal fauna
GameConditionDef.description: All fauna in this area is much larger than usual.

GameConditionDef.label: microfauna
GameConditionDef.description: All fauna in this area is much smaller than usual.

GameConditionDef.label: no wind
GameConditionDef.description: Winds are almost completely absent in this area.

GameConditionDef.label: geomagnetic storm
GameConditionDef.description: An intense geomagnetic event blankets the region, completely disabling all electrical devices.

GameConditionDef.label: skygazing spot
GameConditionDef.description: A serene atmospheric phenomenon encourages colonists to spend more time gazing at the sky. Increases the chance of skygazing and boosts the joy it provides.

GameConditionDef.label: rotten stench
GameConditionDef.description: Acrid vapors seep from the ground, blanketing the area in a foul smell that burns the lungs and sours the mood.
